content.description:
Post optimam cenam, vir quidam, non visus, accessit etÂ 
cecinit. Alius, citharamcithara, -ae, f.: cithara (a stringed musical instrument similar to a harp or guitar) pulsans, quoque non videbatur.
content.question: According to the passage, for which of the following reasons might a guest at the dinner be surprised to hear music playing?

choices.label: The musicians appeared to be unable to perform.
The musicians were playing damaged instruments.

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
